meanings.sent1: She keyboarded her essay for school.
meanings.sent2: He keyboarded a quick email to his boss.
meanings.sent3: The cat keyboarded a message asking for more treats.
meanings.sent4: The rain keyboarded a soothing melody on the rooftop.
meanings.sent5: The students keyboarded furiously during the typing competition.

meanings.definition: Having been typed on a keyboard.
meanings.sent1: The keyboarded document was ready for printing.
meanings.sent2: The keyboarded report was submitted before the deadline.
meanings.sent3: The keyboarded invitation had a few typos.
meanings.sent4: The keyboarded message was lost in the sea of emails.
meanings.sent5: The keyboarded text was easy to edit on the computer.
